an4.205:1: "Bhikkhus, I will teach you about the bad person and the person inferior to the bad person; about the good person and the person superior to the good person. Listen and attend closely; I will speak."
an4.205:2: (1) "And who, bhikkhus, is the bad person? Here, someone is of wrong view, wrong intention, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong concentration.This is called the bad person.
an4.205:3: (2) "And who is the person inferior to the bad person? Here, someone is himself of wrong view and encourages others in wrong view … he is himself of wrong concentration and encourages others in wrong concentration. This is called the person inferior to the bad person.
an4.205:4: (3) "And who is the good person? Here, someone is of right view, right intention, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right concentration. This is called the good person.
an4.205:5: (4) "And who is the person superior to the good person? Here, someone is himself of right view and encourages others in right view … he is himself of right concentration and encourages others in right concentration. This is called the person superior to the good person."
